Uses of Class
net.paulhertz.geom.Matrix3

Packages that use Matrix3
Package Description
net.paulhertz.aifile
Package net.paulhertz.aifile provides dual functionality as a display list utility in Processing and as an export tool that writes to an Adobe Illustrator 7.0 file.
net.paulhertz.geom
Package net.paulhertz.geom provides classes that handle geometric transforms.

  • Uses of Matrix3 in net.paulhertz.aifile

    Fields in net.paulhertz.aifile declared as Matrix3
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected Matrix3 BezShape.ctm
    The most recent transform, set by calls to transform
    Methods in net.paulhertz.aifile that return Matrix3
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Matrix3 DocumentComponent.getAITransform()
    Creates a transform to go from Processing coordinate system to Illustrator coordinate system.
    Matrix3 BezShape.getCtm()
    Returns a copy of the most recent transformation matrix.
    static Matrix3 BezShape.getMatrix​(processing.core.PApplet applet)
    Captures a transformation matrix from a PApplet, for later use.
